languages.text: "Элантах..." {n}Ирлиэт касается сияющего камня на груди и обращает жаждущий взгляд к шпилю. Ее вытянутое лицо обременено странным выражением, словно бурлящий поток из печали, страха и ярости вот-вот прорвется наружу.{/n} "Мои братья с Крудараха все еще там, я это чувствую. Как и то, что пламя их душ неотвратимо угасает".

traits.locale_text: "Эл'антар..." {n}Ирлиэт касается сияющего камня на груди и обращает жаждущий взгляд к шпилю. Ее вытяннутое лицо обременено странным выражением, словно бурлящий поток из печали, страха и ярости вот-вот прорвется наружу.{/n} "Мои братья с Крудараха все еще там, я это чувствую. Как и то, что пламя их душ неотвратимо угасает".

languages.text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."
languages.original_text: "Элантах..." {n}Ирлиэт касается сияющего камня на груди и обращает жаждущий взгляд к шпилю. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

languages.text: « Elantach... » {n}Yrliet touche la pierre lumineuse dans sa poitrine et tourne un regard meurtri en direction de la tour. Son visage affiche une expression singulière, comme si un flot grondant de peine, de peur et de rage était sur le point de jaillir.{/n} « Les miens, ceux de Crudarach, sont toujours là, je peux les sentir. Tout comme je peux sentir leurs âmes s'éteindre inexorablement. »
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: « Elantach... » {n}Yrliet touche la pierre lumineuse dans sa poitrine et tourne un regard meurtri en direction de la tour. Son visage affiche une expression singulière, comme si un flot grondant de peine, de peur et de rage était sur le point de jaillir.{/n} « Les miens, ceux de Crudarach, sont toujours là, je peux les sentir. Tout comme je peux sentir leurs âmes s'éteindre inexorablement. »

languages.text: “外界人……”{n}伊莉耶特触碰着胸前发光的石头，以痛苦的目光看着尖塔。她的脸上带着奇怪的表情，悲伤、恐惧和愤怒的激流仿佛即将爆发。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫的族人还在那里，我能感觉到。他们灵魂的火焰正在无情地慢慢熄灭。”
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: “外界人……”{n}伊莉耶特触碰着胸前发光的石头，以痛苦的目光看着尖塔。她的脸上带着奇怪的表情，悲伤、恐惧和愤怒的激流仿佛即将爆发。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫的族人还在那里，我能感觉到。他们灵魂的火焰正在无情地慢慢熄灭。”

languages.text: 「エランタ…」{n}ユリエットは胸の光る石に触れ、痛々しい視線を尖塔に向けた。彼女の顔には、悲しみと恐怖と怒りが今にも濁流となってあふれ出そうな、奇妙な表情が浮かんでいる。{/n}「クルダラの血族がまだあそこにいる。私には感じられるのだ。彼らの魂の炎が容赦なく消えていくのを感じる」
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ…」{n}ユリエットは胸の光る石に触れ、痛々しい視線を尖塔に向けた。彼女の顔には、悲しみと恐怖と怒りが今にも濁流となってあふれ出そうな、奇妙な表情が浮かんでいる。{/n}「クルダラの血族がまだあそこにいる。私には感じられるのだ。彼らの魂の炎が容赦なく消えていくのを感じる」

languages.text: "Elantach ..." {n}Yrliet berührt den leuchtenden Stein in ihrer Brust und schaut schmerzvoll in Richtung des Turms. Ihr Gesicht zeigt einen seltsamen Ausdruck, als ob Traurigkeit, Angst und Wut gleich aus ihr heraussprudeln.{/n} "Ich spüre, dass mein Volk aus Crudarach immer noch da ist. Denn ich spüre, wie die Flammen ihrer Seelen unweigerlich dabei sind zu erlöschen."
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach ..." {n}Yrliet berührt den leuchtenden Stein in ihrer Brust und schaut schmerzvoll in Richtung des Turms. Ihr Gesicht zeigt einen seltsamen Ausdruck, als ob Traurigkeit, Angst und Wut gleich aus ihr heraussprudeln.{/n} "Ich spüre, dass mein Volk aus Crudarach immer noch da ist. Denn ich spüre, wie die Flammen ihrer Seelen unweigerlich dabei sind zu erlöschen."

languages.text: «Elantach...». {n}Yrliet toca la piedra brillante de su pecho y desvía su mirada hacia la torre. Su rostro tiene una expresión extraña, como si estuviese a punto de brotar un caudaloso torrente de tristeza, miedo y furia.{/n} «Mis congéneres de Crudarach aún siguen ahí, puedo sentirlo. Igual que siento cómo se extinguen inexorablemente las llamas de sus almas».
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach...». {n}Yrliet toca la piedra brillante de su pecho y desvía su mirada hacia la torre. Su rostro tiene una expresión extraña, como si estuviese a punto de brotar un caudaloso torrente de tristeza, miedo y furia.{/n} «Mis congéneres de Crudarach aún siguen ahí, puedo sentirlo. Igual que siento cómo se extinguen inexorablemente las llamas de sus almas».

languages.text: "Elantach." {n}Yrliet, göğsündeki parlaklık yayan taşa dokunup ağrılı bakışlarını kuleye çeviriyor. Yüzünde tuhaf bir ifadenin ağırlığı var. Âdeta hüzün, korku ve öfkeden oluşan şiddetli bir kasırga patlak vermek üzere gibi.{/n} "Crudarach'taki soydaşlarım hâlâ burada, hissedebiliyorum. Ruhlarının alevinin merhametsizce söndürüldüğünü de seziyorum."
languages.original_text: "Elantach..." {n}Yrliet touches the glowing stone in her chest and turns her aching gaze to the spire. Her face is burdened with a strange expression, as if a roaring torrent of sadness, fear, and rage is about to erupt.{/n} "My kin from Crudarach are still there, I can sense it. As I can sense the flames of their souls inexorably going out."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach." {n}Yrliet göğsündeki parlaklık yayan taşa dokunuyor ve ağrılı bakışlarını kuleye çeviriyor. Yüzünde tuhaf bir ifadenin ağırlığı var. Adeta hüzün, korku ve öfkeden oluşan şiddetli bir kasırga patlak vermek üzere gibi.{/n} "Crudarach'taki soydaşlarım hâlâ burada, hissedebiliyorum. Ruhlarının alevinin merhametsizce söndürüldüğünü hissettiğim gibi."
